parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Insufficient seat belt length can compromise the safety of occupants, particularly those with larger waist sizes, by failing to provide adequate restraint in the event of a crash.
symptoms: unable to fit around larger waist sizes (e.g.
difficulty or impossibility of securing the seat belt.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A failed seat belt can lead to serious injury or fatality in the event of a crash, as it may not provide adequate restraint or protection to the occupant.
A malfunctioning seat belt buckle can prevent the occupant from securing themselves properly, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of a crash.
symptoms: Seat belt buckle locks or jams
unable to open or release the buckle
difficulty or impossibility of securing the seat belt.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: followed by loss of traction and potential loss of vehicle control.
